title: Blue Lazers Watchface Android
developerAddress: Office #2, 2nd Floor, 37- A, Civic Centre, Bahria Town, Islamabad
description: Blue Lazers watchface keeps you up to date without taking you away from the moment. It’s a hybrid watch face for your smartwatch with dials like analog and time and date displayed in digits for easy reading. Get all the important updates right on your screen, this watchface is designed with options to choose between multiple features simultaneously. You can select either to preview your watch or mobile battery status and unread message or missed calls alerts.   Watch360 focus is in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and took enormous time to choose the watch colors with soothing effect which ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable.Key custom features:-• Watch and Mobile battery health.• Unread messages notification.• Missed calls alerts.• Easy readability with hybrid design.• Multi-colored themes.• Ambient mode engineered with the latest wear Api makes your watch’s battery stronger than everThis watch face is for round/circular smart watches only such as the LG Watch Urbane, LG Watch R and Motorola Moto 360. Visit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frillroid.com.How it works?It’s simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen. Open Settings from Android Wear app to customize the Watch Face. Get this app now and provide us your feedback :)
descriptionHTML:
Blue Lazers watchface keeps you up to date without taking you away from the moment. It’s a hybrid watch face for your smartwatch with dials like analog and time and date displayed in digits for easy reading. Get all the important updates right on your screen, this watchface is designed with options to choose between multiple features simultaneously. You can select either to preview your watch or mobile battery status and unread message or missed calls alerts.

Watch360 focus is in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and took enormous time to choose the watch colors with soothing effect which ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable.

Key custom features:-

• Watch and Mobile battery health.
• Unread messages notification.
• Missed calls alerts.
• Easy readability with hybrid design.
• Multi-colored themes.
• Ambient mode engineered with the latest wear Api makes your watch’s battery stronger than ever
This watch face is for round/circular smart watches only such as the LG Watch Urbane, LG Watch R and Motorola Moto 360. Visit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frillroid.com.

How it works?

It’s simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen. Open Settings from Android Wear app to customize the Watch Face. Get this app now and provide us your feedback :)
